mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tracking ( trackingNo, onEquipNo, latitude, longitude, savedTime ) VALUES ( tracking_seq.nextval, #{onEquipNo}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT trackingNo, onEquipNo, latitude, longitude, savedTime, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY savedTime DESC ) FROM tracking WHERE onEquipNo = #{onEquipNo}
mapper.insert: insert into onEquip ( onEquipNo, memberId, onEquipRegDate, onEquipDeleted, equipNo, serialNumber ) values ( onequip_seq.nextval, #{memberId}, sysdate, 0, #{equipNo}, #{serialNumber} )
mapper.select: select serialNumber from onEquip where MEMBERID = #{memberId};
